name: cooking_pause
description: This function is used to pause the cooking process on a cooker without canceling or stopping it.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device whose cooking process is being paused.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The specific compartment of the device whose cooking process is being paused.
